title: Bug splat
body: Bug splat when starting the client

replies.body: You may be having driver or game file issues failing to load the client, but don't worry!  Go over the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to make sure everything is in order and repair any necessarily files!  Let me know if you have any questions!
